ygData.messageBody:
In order to eliminate about half the number of keys/clicks bards need to do:

Have the program changed so that when you click a song, it automatically
stops the one currently playing and starts the new one. The exceptions where
if it is the song currently being played - that stops it and if no song is
playing it starts it. So now to twist/weave/play songs you could click:

chain
fear
denons
chain
fear
denons
chain (chain stops by itself at end of its pulse like it does now)

anthem
chords
anthem
chords
anthem
chords
chords (this second one to stop it)

Would we lose anything this way?

Sylly - the bard~!

p.s. so what if it makes Bard's the most powerful class in the game and
hundreds and hundreds of people start new bards and raise them to level 50
in 21 days played.

"Welcome to Plane of Fear. You have entered the zone."

and will play it in combat!!)
